Hospitality Business Plan

The module is designed to enable students to apply all their management skills oward a business project, and defend it in front of a professional jury.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Assessment the potential of a location for setting up a hospitality business.

+  Built a business plan, and defend its profitability and reliability.

+  Defend a funding plan for securing investor(s).

+  Design a technical feasibility including layout, fitting, basic interior design etc.

+  Design marketing and advertising plan for selected hospitality concept.
